notes.player:
Flechette Blasters are a type of weapon used by Adeptus Mechanicus Skitarii. A lightweight but lethal firearm, it is the favored tool of Sicarian Infiltrators. This silenced weapon fires hundreds of tiny darts, each of which bears a dormant cell awakened in the gun's chamber. When one dart hits it emits a homing beacon that attracts others, resulting in a series of impacts that burrow through bone.
Under normal Imperial circumstances, all
weapons worsen their availability by one step
(Common to Scarce, etc) and increase their costs by
somewhere between 2 â€“ 5x the original amount, as
appropriate to the weapon.
